Literature.Title: Interaction of a novel antimicrobial peptide isolated from the venom of solitary bee Colletes daviesanus with phospholipid vesicles and Escherichia coli cells.
Literature.Author: Cujová S, Bednárová L, Slaninová J, Straka J, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus CCM 144(MIC=1.7µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=4.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=2.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=53.3µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=8.7µM)
